Some careers shine brighter than others.If youâ€™re looking for a career that will help you stand out, join HSBC and fulfil your potential. Whether you want a career that could take you to the top, or simply take you in an exciting new direction, HSBC offers opportunities, support and rewards that will take you further.HSBC is one of the largest banking and financial services organisations in the world, with operations in 64 countries and territories. We aim to be where the growth is, enabling businesses to thrive and economies to prosper, and, ultimately, helping people to fulfil their hopes and realise their ambitions.We are currently seeking an experienced professional to join our team in the role of Senior Software Engineer..In this role, you will:Test software solutions by studying information needs, conferring with users and various teams, studying systems flow, data usage, and work processes; investigating problem areas; and following the software development lifecycle
Be involved in designing Test cases, defect management, Test management
Be preparing and installing solutions by determining and designing system specifications, standards, and programming
Lead and drive deliverables end to end
Be Mentoring team members to deliver with new ways of working.Job Details
